description:
The space
Our apartment is a spacious studio on the 4th floor of a modern elevator building in Williamsburg. 

The apartment is light-filled, quiet and warm. 

The apartment is close to lots of transport options - Marcy stop on JMZ subway line (7 min), East River Ferry (7 min) and Bedford L stop (15 min). Easily accessible from JFK airport on the train and close to the Williamsburg bridge.

Lots of great cafes and bars nearby - Marlow and Sons, Diner, Baby's All Right and Donna.
name: Sunny Modern Studio in Williamsburg
review: Très bel appartement lumineux et propre, situé à un arrêt de métro (à 5 minutes à pieds) de Manhattan, dans un immeuble disposant d'un rooftop dans un quartier branché.
